properties.name: Belleville-Hastings-Quinte
properties.description: Posted by Wmacphail470 Dundas Street East, Belleville, OntarioTel: (613) 962-0892 Fax: (613) 962-1225 Email: adminbhq@bellnet.ca Our chapter provides services to individuals with Alzheimer Disease (and other related dementias), support for care-givers, and informs the public in the communities we serve; Quinte West, all of Hastings County, the Brighton area and the northern area of Prince Edward County. We have 2 office locations: BayView Mall in Belleville and the Professional Services Building in Bancroft.

properties.name: Brant
properties.description: Posted by Wmacphail101 Brant Avenue, Brantford, OntarioTel: (519) 759-7692 Fax: (519) 759-8353 Email: alzheimer1@on.aibn.com Alzheimer Disease is the leading cause of dementia - a set of symptoms that includes the loss of memory, judgement and reasoning, and changes in mood and behaviour. Persons may mistakenly assume that such behaviour is a normal part of aging. It is not. The Alzheimer Society of Brant offers several programs and services which are listed on this website to assist caregivers in relieving some of the stress and challenges associated with caring for Alzheimer persons.
